statusList.Name: Stun
statusList.Description: Stuns the enemy, making them unable to move for 1 turn.

statusList.Name: Burn
statusList.Description: Burns the enemy for 10% of their maximum health over 2 turns.

statusList.Name: Immobilize
statusList.Description: Immobilizes the enemy, reducing their Dexterity by 25% for 1 turn.
